level.heading: Power to sue and be sued.
level.text: A statutory trust may sue and be sued in its own name.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 29-1201.04 and § 29-1204.05.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 308 of the Uniform Statutory Trust Entity Act.
